EmailTemplate.name: NA-Global_Greenplum_Sandbox_Adobe_Connect.Invite - NA 12-8-15
EmailTemplate.subject: Greenplum Community Meeting - A Guided Tour of the Greenplum Sandbox 12/8
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Tuesday, December 8, 2015 JOIN HERE <Join the session: https://pivotalcommunity.adobeconnect.com/greenplumsandbox> Greenplum Sandbox: A Guided Tour of the New Greenplum Sandbox During this session Dan Baskette, Director of Technical Marketing will use a sample scenario, including data, to demonstrate how to set up the Greenplum sandbox on your own.
Join the session: https://pivotalcommunity.adobeconnect.com/greenplumsandbox
TIMEZONES:
12/8 San Francisco, USA 9:00AM PST UTC-8 hours
We look forward to having you join us!
